alert.note: Alert for Cleveland; Garvin; Grady; Lincoln; Logan; McClain; Oklahoma; Pottawatomie; Seminole (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 9:55PM CDT until June 15 at 10:45PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Garvin County in southern Oklahoma... Northern Grady County in central Oklahoma... Northern Seminole County in east central Oklahoma... Southeastern Oklahoma County in central Oklahoma... Lincoln County in central Oklahoma... Cleveland County in central Oklahoma... Southeastern Logan County in central Oklahoma... Pottawatomie County in central Oklahoma... McClain County in central Oklahoma... * Until 1045 PM CDT. * At 954 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 3 miles east of Carney to near Oklahoma City to 4 miles southeast of Chickasha, moving southeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Oklahoma City, Norman, southeastern Edmond, Moore, Midwest City, Shawnee, Del City, Chickasha, Newcastle, Blanchard, Seminole, Tecumseh, Purcell, Chandler, Choctaw, Noble, Tuttle, Harrah, Slaughterville, and McLoud. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Cleveland; Garvin; Grady; Lincoln; Logan; McClain; Oklahoma; Pottawatomie; Seminole
